Description: Magento is an open source digital commerce platform.
Name: Magento

Methods.Name: Get Product Images
Methods.Description: Retrieves information about all images of a specified product.

Methods.Name: Delete Product Category
Methods.Description: Delete a category for a specific product.

Methods.Name: Set Product Category
Methods.Description: Assign a category to a product.

Methods.Name: Get Product Category
Methods.Description: Retrieve the category of a product.

Methods.Name: Delete Product
Methods.Description: Delete a product.

Methods.Name: Get Product
Methods.Description: Retrieve a product with information about it.

Methods.Name: Update Product
Methods.Description: Update a product's information.

Methods.Name: Create Product
Methods.Description: Create a new simple product.

Methods.Name: Update Stock Item
Methods.Description: Allows you to update information on a single stock item.

Methods.Name: Get Stock Item
Methods.Description: Allows you to get information on a single stock item.

Methods.Name: List Stock Items
Methods.Description: Retrieve a list of existing stock items and details about them.

Methods.Name: Update Stock Items
Methods.Description: Update existing stock items.

Methods.Name: Get Customers
Methods.Description: Allows you to retrieve the list of existing customers.

Methods.Name: Delete Customer Address
Methods.Description: Allows you to delete an existing customer address.

Methods.Name: Create Customer Address
Methods.Description: Allows you to create a new customer address.

Methods.Name: Get Customer Addresses
Methods.Description: Allows you to retrieve the list of existing customer addresses.

Methods.Name: Delete Customer
Methods.Description: Allows you to delete an existing customer.

Methods.Name: Update Customer
Methods.Description: Allows you to update an existing customer.

Methods.Name: Create Customer
Methods.Description: Allows you to create a new customer.

Methods.Name: Get New Customers
Methods.Description: Allows you to retrieve the list of existing customers created since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Customer
Methods.Description: Allows you to retrieve information on an existing customer.

Methods.Name: Get New Orders
Methods.Description: Gets a list of new orders since last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Order Items
Methods.Description: Allows you to get information about order items.

Methods.Name: Get Shipping Address
Methods.Description: Retrieves the shipping address of an order.

Methods.Name: Get Billing Address
Methods.Description: Retrieves the billing address of an order.

Methods.Name: Get Order
Methods.Description: Allows you to get information about an order.

Methods.Name: Get Orders
Methods.Description: Allows you to retrieve information on existing orders.

MetaDescription: Integrate Magento eCommerce shops with your application to enhance your users' marketing, communications, data management & shop administration.
Content:
Seamlessly integrate your application with Magento eCommerce shops, helping automate your users' marketing, finance & organisational systems.

Use Cyclr’s easy to use drag-and-drop workflow builder to build and publish integrations for your users, letting them do more with their resources; making their sales & customer data work for them.
